<@UFURR5PM3>

You can use: `blog_recent_tag_posts(...)`
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#blog-recent-tag-posts>

And you have the sort filter: `(...)|sort(False, False, 'name')`
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#sort>
